summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 7, 2020, discussing the transfer of Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and the scheduling of her upcoming bail hearing. The email originates from the FBI's Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit seeking updates.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; she has been transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and is awaiting a bail hearing.

persons.name: SSA CARD Coordinator
persons.context: The author of the initial inquiry email from the FBI's Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit (CACHTU), seeking details on Maxwell's transfer and hearing dates.

events.title: Maxwell transferred to MDC Brooklyn
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn.

events.title: Scheduled bail hearing for Maxwell
events.description: Maxwell is expected to have a bail hearing, possibly on this Friday, though it could be moved to the following week.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn on July 6, 2020.
A bail hearing for Maxwell was anticipated for Friday, July 10, 2020, but could be postponed to the following week.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit (CACHTU) was actively seeking updates on her case status.
The document is an internal FBI email chain, indicating ongoing coordination and monitoring of Maxwell's custody and legal proceedings.
